```{r message=FALSE}
library(flowWorkspace)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Load FlowJo workspace
```{r}
(ws <- openWorkspace("data/27-Mar-2018 TNAP-YFP D10.wsp"))
```

Access list of samples
```{r}
getSamples(ws)
```

Acces groups
```{r}
getSampleGroups(ws)
```

# Parsing the workspace
```{r}
(gs <- parseWorkspace(ws, name = 1))
```
